title: SumSocs sign up as Solo/Duo get put on a team for a 5v5  Tournament
body:
Hello Summoners,

Just wanted to let you know that SumSoc runs solo/duo tournaments. This means you can sign up as a solo player or duo (with a friend) and get put on to a team. If you don't know many people in league of legends and want to play some competitive league its good way to get started!  

Its great way each month to meet knew people and maybe win some rp! 

LSD
